kickstart.post:
MEM_SIZE=`gawk '/Mem:/ { print int($2/(1024*1024)) }' /proc/meminfo` if [ $MEM_SIZE -ge 1000 ]; then MEM_SIZE=1000 fi
dd if=/dev/zero of=/swap1 bs=1M count=$MEM_SIZE chmod 600 /swap1
/sbin/mkswap /swap1
gawk '/swap/ { \ if ($3 == "swap") { \ next; \ } \ } \ { print $0 } ' /etc/fstab > /tmp/fstab
mv /tmp/fstab /etc/fstab
/swap1 swap swap defaults 0 0
